metadata.title: NESCAFÉ GOLD Vanilla Latte Instant Coffee

text: NESCAFÉ GOLD Vanilla Latte Instant Coffee

Discover indulgent moments brewed with the perfect balance of select, high-quality ingredients. NESCAFE GOLD Vanilla Latte Flavoured Coffee Mix easily crafts an indulgent vanilla-infused coffee with mouthwatering foam – with no barista required. A great way to serve up and share a creamy delight or a delectable vanilla treat.
8 sachets for sharing a perfectly foamy and creamy vanilla delight
Each sachet whips up a vanilla-infused coffee with mouthwatering foam
Pre-dosed, so there’s no other ingredients required
Made with high-quality ingredients to exceed your expectations for instant coffee
Per 18 g sachetAmount% DVCalories80Carbohydrate14gFibre0g0%Sugars9g9%Fat2g3%Cholesterol0mgSaturated Fat1.5gTrans Fat0gProtein1gSodium100mg4%Amount% DVCalcium50mg4%Iron0mg0%Potassium100mg3%
Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Instant Coffee, Skim Milk Powder, Coconut Oil, Lactose, Salt, Milk Fat, Flavour, Dipotassium Phosphate, Sodium Polyphosphate, Sodium Citrate.
